channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Avaya Aura Communication Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Avaya Aura Communication Manager

item.title: CVE-2022-2249|2024-08-03T00:32:09.514Z -- avaya -- avaya%20aura%20communication%20manager
item.description: Privilege escalation related vulnerabilities were discovered in Avaya Aura Communication Manager that may allow local administrative users to escalate their privileges. This issue affects Communication Manager versions 8.0.0.0 through 8.1.3.3 and 10.1.0.0.
